DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-110
DataSourceDefinition.Expression:
select cab_rec.COD_USUA_INGR as usuario, op.COD_OPER, per.val_nomb_peri, est_rec.COD_ESTA, nvl(count(distinct op_rec.OID_OPER_RECL),0)cant_reclamos, decode( nvl(SUM(count(distinct op_rec.OID_OPER_RECL)) OVER (PARTITION BY cod_usua_ingr),0),0,0,count(distinct op_rec.OID_OPER_RECL) / SUM(count(distinct op_rec.OID_OPER_RECL)) OVER (PARTITION BY cod_usua_ingr) )*100 por_participacion, nvl(sum(lin_op.NUM_UNID_RECL),0)num_unid_rec, nvl(sum(lin_op.NUM_UNID_RECL * lin_op.VAL_PREC),0)monto, nvl(sum(cab_rec.NUM_TOTA_ENVI - cab_rec.NUM_TOTA_DEVU),0)monto_diferencia from rec_cabec_recla cab_rec, rec_opera_recla op_rec, rec_linea_opera_recla lin_op, rec_tipos_opera t_op, rec_opera op, rec_estad_recla est_rec, cra_perio per, ped_solic_cabec sol, ped_tipo_solic_pais t_sol_p, ped_tipo_solic t_sol where cab_rec.OID_CABE_RECL = op_rec.CARE_OID_CABE_RECL and op_rec.OID_OPER_RECL = lin_op.OPRE_OID_OPER_RECL and t_op.ROPE_OID_OPER = op.OID_OPER AND OP_REC.TIOP_OID_TIPO_OPER = T_OP.OID_TIPO_OPER and cab_rec.ESRE_OID_ESTA_RECL = est_rec.OID_ESTA_RECL and cab_rec.PERD_OID_PERI_RECL = per.oid_peri and cab_rec.soca_oid_soli_cabe = sol.oid_soli_cabe and sol.TSPA_OID_TIPO_SOLI_PAIS = t_sol_p.oid_tipo_soli_pais and t_sol_p.TSOL_OID_TIPO_SOLI = t_sol.oid_tipo_soli %start_FORMAINGRESOVALUES% and t_sol.acce_oid_acce in (%value_FORMAINGRESOVALUES%) %end_FORMAINGRESOVALUES% and cab_rec.pais_oid_pais = %value_PAISVALUE% and per.marc_oid_marc = %value_MARCAVALUE% and per.cana_oid_cana = %value_CANALVALUE% and per.oid_peri = %value_CAMPANIAVALUE%
group by cab_rec.COD_USUA_INGR, op.COD_OPER, est_rec.COD_ESTA, per.val_nomb_peri %and_prefilter% order by cab_rec.COD_USUA_INGR, op.COD_OPER, est_rec.COD_ESTA
